name: MHR-Custom-Anti-Copy
author: Mahadir Ahmad

sections.description: This plugin allows you to disable right click and word selection on posts or pages. MHR Anti Copy comes with flexible custom settings. You can protect a single page/post or overall pages. Everything can be done with a few simple steps. With shotcodes you can protect a single page or post easily.
sections.installation:
The automatic plugin installer should work for most people. Manual installation is easy and takes fewer than five minutes.

  1. Upload the entire folder of MHR-Custom-Anti-Copy to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings and then MHR-Anti-Copy-CUstom to configure and enable.
sections.faq:
Can I ask for support?

Yes of course, please visit plugin site and ask via comment.

This protection can hurt my SEO?

Absolutely not, this plugin just add a few lines of javascript codes.It only affect the client side browser. Google bot or others crawler will not be affected.
